prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles a sea creature with flowing fins and a playful expression.
Show me a Pokemon with a sleek, aquatic body and vibrant blue colors that blend into the ocean.
Imagine a Pokemon with a shimmering coat and elegant features that glides effortlessly through water.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies the essence of water, with smooth curves and a serene demeanor.
Design a Pokemon that has a combination of blue and white colors, resembling both a cat and a fish.
Give me a Pokemon that showcases unique fins and a playful personality, perfect for underwater adventures.
Make a Pokemon that stands out with its distinctive tail and large, expressive eyes.
